amendment.description: To authorize the National Defense University to award the degree of Master of Science in Joint Campaign Planning and Strategy.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1315 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1315 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S8542, S8543; text: CR S8542) To authorize the National Defense University to award the degree of Master of Science in Joint Campaign Planning and Strategy.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1315 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1315 proposed by Senator Warner.
